articles.title: The frenzied, gamified chase for Labubus
articles.description: On Thursday night, I toggled endlessly between a TikTok Live stream and a shopping app in anticipation of 9:30PM. For 30 minutes, I hunted for an available listing; many expletives were uttered. I exhibited bot behavior and got iced out of the app multiple times. I tapped so many times my thumbs got sore. This […]
articles.author: Mia Sato

articles.title: The intolerable memes of Alligator Alcatraz
articles.description: Alligator Alcatraz, Florida's hastily built, $225 million-and-counting immigrant detention facility in the Everglades, is both a de facto concentration camp and a right-wing meme. President Donald Trump's most ardent supporters are willing to excuse - or are in some cases reveling in - allegations of inhumane treatment at the facility: worms in food, floors flooded […]
articles.author: Gaby Del Valle

articles.title: I tasked Alexa Plus with tackling my to-do list — it was hit or miss
articles.description: One of the best features of Amazon's new Alexa Plus is that I don't have to "speak Alexa" anymore. I've been testing the voice assistant for about a week now, and it understands what I say, regardless of how I say it - there's no more need for precise phrasing to get Alexa to do […]
articles.author: Jennifer Pattison Tuohy

articles.title: The Switch 2’s next killer app is already here
articles.description: Hi, friends! Welcome to Installer No. 90, your guide to the best and Verge-iest stuff in the world. This week, I have been watching The Bear's fourth season, preparing for the deluge of […]
articles.author: Jay Peters

articles.title: Anker Nebula X1 review: a terrific home theater that goes anywhere
articles.description: I seldom sleep in the same place for more than a couple of weeks at a time, so I'm a big fan of portable all-in-one projectors. They're small and set up quickly, making them ideal for vanlife, gaming parties, outdoor movie nights, or an evening in on the couch - but they usually sacrifice quality […]
articles.author: Thomas Ricker
